alert.note: Alert for Kingsbury (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:51PM MDT until July 13 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KINGSBURY COUNTY... At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Preston, or 9 miles north of Lake Thompson State Recreation Area, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. At 448 pm, the public reported ping pong ball size hail in Erwin, South Dakota! IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... De Smet, Lake Preston, Badger and Erwin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
